These calculalions can be streamlined. It turns out that each simp\c)!: step solves 
three linear systems with the same matru. B. (This is the m by m matri)!: that keeps 
me m basic columns of A.) When a new column enters and an old column leaves. 
there is a quick way to update B-1. That is how most computer codes organize the 
steps of the simple)!: method. 
One final note. We described how to go from one comer to a better neighbor.
